items.name: Aegis Aurora
explicitMods: Recover Energy Shield equal to 2% of Armour when you Block
13% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
flavourText: Born from the marriage of ice and sky,
the aurora evokes both awe and power.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon Skeleton Warrior minions at the targeted location. They use a melee attack and die after a duration. If made aggressive, Skeleton Warriors will also dash towards nearby enemies.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spell skills, making them repeat when cast. Cannot support Vaal skills, totem skills, channelling skills, triggered skills, instant skills, or skills with a reservation.
explicitMods: Supported Skills Repeat an additional time
Supported Skills have 54% more Cast Speed
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which lets you deal more physical damage. When you kill an enemy while you have this buff, this skill will summon a Sentinel of Purity, or refresh the duration and life of an existing one instead if you have the maximum number of them. The Sentinels of Purity have a single-target melee attack and an area melee attack.
explicitMods: Summon a Sentinel of Purity when you Kill an Enemy
20% chance to Summon a Sentinel of Purity when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Foe Road
implicitMods: Ignites you inflict deal Damage 5% faster

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 3.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 40% reduced Chaining range
Projectiles from Supported Skills have 4.8 metres maximum range
Supported Skills have 40% less Area of Effect
Supported Skills Deal 41% more Damage with Hits against Branded Enemy
Supported Skills are Triggered by Arcanist Brand, from the Brand's location
hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that have no reservation. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their fire resistance and giving them a chance to be ignited when hit.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -36% to Fire Resistance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +25% chance to Ignite
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Strikes enemies in front of you with a surge of flame. Burning enemies are dealt more damage. If you hit an ignited enemy, will create burning ground under them. Your damage modifiers don't apply to this burning ground.
explicitMods: 50% more Damage with Hits against Burning enemies
Hits on Ignited Enemies create Burning Ground, no more than once every 2 seconds
Burning Ground deals 25% of Fire Damage per second of Ignite affecting Enemy
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Fire, Lightning, Spell, AoE, Duration, Physical

socketedItems.secDescrText: An expanding wave of energy surges forward, damaging enemies in a cone-shaped area over a duration. Each enemy hit is inflicted with Exposure matching the element of which they took the highest damage. Only one Wave of Conviction can be active at a time
explicitMods: 25% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
25% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
Exposure applies -15% to Elemental Resistance matching highest Damage taken
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Cloak of Flame
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
explicitMods: Reflects 100 Fire Damage to Melee Attackers
40% of Physical Damage taken as Fire Damage
flavourText: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a Stone Golem that grants you life regeneration. In addition to its melee attack, the Stone Golem uses a rolling charge and a powerful slam that can taunt enemies.
explicitMods: Golems grant 110 Life Regenerated per second

explicitMods: Increases and Reductions to Minion Damage also affect you at 150% of their value

comes an increasing desire for it.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground in your wake. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.

items.name: Polaric Devastation
enchantMods: Your Scout Towers have 25% increased Range
explicitMods: 16% increased Duration of Ailments on Enemies
Left Ring slot: Cover Enemies in Ash for 5 seconds when you Ignite them
Right Ring slot: Cover Enemies in Frost for 5 seconds when you Freeze them
flavourText: Those that escaped the annihilating light
sank eternally into crushing darkness.

items.name: Maw of Mischief
explicitMods: 27% reduced Mana Cost of Minion Skills
flavourText: The line that divides hope and fear,
life and death, crowd and mob,
is as thin as a whisper.

socketedItems.name: Whispering Vision
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an Abyssal Socket on an Item or into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Replica Dragonfang's Flight
explicitMods: +3 to Level of all Summon Stone Golem Gems
Items and Gems have 10% reduced Attribute Requirements
flavourText: "Did we make this? Why do we have no record of it?
We were warned that there would be consequences..."
- Administrator Qotra

items.typeLine: Flagellant's Quicksilver Flask of the Cheetah
explicitMods: Gain 3 Charges when you are Hit by an Enemy
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Quill Rain
flavourText: "The rain of a thousand quills that whittle
present into past, life into death."
- Rigwald of the Ezomytes

just as quickly. This could have been much worse."
- Lead Researcher Ksaret
